textProject: GraphiQL is a powerful playground and IDE (Integrated Development Environment) for GraphQL. It provides a user-friendly interface for testing and exploring GraphQL APIs, making it easier for developers to interact with their GraphQL services.
textDevelopers: We are the LuckyCoders team: alima987, getgitgood, and ArtemDolgopolov. We are passionate about programming and strive for professional growth in the IT industry. We have different areas of interest and experience, but we all share a burning desire to create something amazing through code.
textCourse: The React RS School course is an educational program aimed at teaching web application development using the React library.
